geneticAlogrithm

Class SequenceMutation

  • java.lang.Object
    • geneticAlogrithm.SequenceMutation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.EvolutionaryOperator<Sequence>

    public class SequenceMutation
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.EvolutionaryOperator<Sequence>

    Class which define the Mutation operation for an object of type Sequence
    you had to implement it to use the watchmer's GA algorithm.
    For more details, look at the watchmaker API

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Yves Hervo
    See Also:
    Sequence

      • mutateString

        private Sequence mutateString(Sequence s,
                    java.util.Random rng)
        Method overWrited from watchMaker's API AbstractCrossover class. It define the operation of Mutation for a Sequence. It produce a new Sequence by using the Cross over operation on a random box of the array (with a probability). It is used in the GACall.
        Parameters:
        s - the original sequence.
        rng - a random generator.
        Returns:
        Sequence where a mutation has been applied.
        Since:
        0.1
